data.message: I begged and begged that my name be put back to the way i had it for years so that i would not be found by my Abuser.  My children and I have now been contacted by OUR Abuser and we are NO longer Safe because of FACEBOOK and GOOGLE!  It was a simple fix that i begged you to do for me and my children and NOW, we are victims once again!  I hope your proud that you did not help me with a simple name change!!!

replies.message: Hi Loreena. We're sorry to hear about this situation. Can you send us a direct message with additional information? Thanks. -Azaria

I have sent you guys messages one after another begging for a fix to my name being put back to the way it was for years here on FB and each and every time they blew me off with their By the book Standard answers and NOT once paid any attention to my request.  IF i send you a direct message again, i will get the automated response at first and then days later will get blown off Again with Text Book Training Response!  Why should i bother?  So you can get me off of here where everyone can see the Danger Facebook has put me in over a simple fix such as a name change!?
Welcome to Facebook... Social Media at its best!
